set.name: reward_desc
set.value: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 84 you can get a reward for that level once. Even if you reach higher levels, you can only receive the reward once a day. (Based on the level of the character’s dual class)

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you reach Dual Class Lv. 84

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Worried about what you’ll be doing this weekend? Just login.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you login during the weekend

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Don’t have a hobby to keep you busy for a month? It’s time to level up then.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you login more than once during the month

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Don’t just go hunt without purpose. Make sure to get your quests to get rewarded.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you complete 2 daily quests

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Don’t you want fame? Fight in the Olympiad for your honor. Losing is not something to be ashamed of.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you participate in the Olympiad 2 times

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Don’t just stand there and watch the siege. Participate to get the amazing rewards.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you login to participate in a siege. (Only for clan members who participate in the siege.)

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: Anyone can fight against 16 opponents at once. Fighting against 17, however, is a different story.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: eceive it when you participate in a Ceremony of Chaos 2 times

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: The reason why I go to instance dungeons is to… fight bosses.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you participate in a daily instance dungeon 3 times

set.name: reward_desc
set.value: You’ll come to a realization when you do something three times. The realization that you can’t just end at the third time.

set.name: reward_period
set.value: Receive it when you fish three times
